The claim is attributed to Ohio Gov: John Kasich, who made the statement during his campaign in Ohio.
The claim references a famous saying oft: Truman, the 33rd president of the United States.
The historians at the Harry S: Truman Library and Museum have stated that there is no evidence to confirm or verify that Truman ever wrote or said the quote in question.
Previous investigations have found that: with the mistake appearing in various publications and op-eds.
